line_1: Nor let officious mem'ry thus torment,
line_2: It was her own, on fatal purpose bent,

line_1: " Their deep-embosom'd peace shall e'er torment;
line_2: " Their undisturbed lays of pure content,

line_1: His Ariel would my hapless sprite torment,
line_2: Should Stella blab the secret I'd prevent.

line_1: Then Hymen does them both torment,
line_2: At last the charmer gives consent;

line_1: And nice distinctions nicer souls torment;
line_2: Tho' polish'd manners may fresh wants invent,

line_1: The simple swains no sighs for gold torment.
line_2: Where (stranger still!) with their wild dates content,
